{{Infobox Network Adapter |image1 = |image1_size = |caption = |caption2 = |pp = |sp = |dl = |wikidevi = |wikipedia = |brand = Hawking |model = HWU54D |submodelappend = |submodel = |revision = Z |subrevision = (RFMD) |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |sernum = |wlclass = G54 |series = |if = USB |if_bus_version = 2.0 |ifconnector = Female Mini-B |formfactor = corded (modular) adapter |vendor_id = 0ace |device_id = 1211 |subvendor_id = |subdevice_id = |id_string = |windosid = |fcc_id = NDD9571130403,NDD9573170407 |icid = |boardid = |ecc_id = |oui = 00:0E:3B |chip1 = ZyDAS;ZD1211; |chip2 = RFMD;RF2959; |chip3 = |chip4 = |antconn = |antenna = |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11b/g |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |wififreq = 2.4 |receive_sens = |transmit_power = |linuxdriv = |windriv = |is_manuf = No |manuf = Edimax |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |addchip = |flags = hg directional |802dot11_protocols = bg |accessible_UART = No |accessible_JTAG = |category = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |country = |powledcolor = |connactled = |spdledcolor = |leddupcolor = |dimmin = |weight = }}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== This device is mislabeled with a wrong or invalid FCC ID. :NDD9573170407 defines an Envara WiND adapter, however, the HWU54D rev Z is a ZyDAS based adapter :NDD9571130403 is an invalid FCC ID. Revision Z ''may'' have a serial number with format '''HEMTU54DZ_______'''.
The original version ''may'' have a serial number with the format '''HEMTU54D_______'''. :If my calculations are correct, the RFMD model serial follows '''HEMTU54DZ04_____''' convention and the Airoha model serial follows '''HEMTU54DZ05_____''' convention, but this is certainly not confirmed. 
[ 8915.466316] zd1211rw 1-3:1.0: zd1211 chip 0ace:1211 v4330 high 00-0e-3b RF2959_RF pa0 -----
